title: Why works information
creator_credit: Anglo-Scottish Pictures and Central Office of Information
brief_description: The story, in humorously dramatised form, of how morale and production suffered in a factory which brought in new machines without informing its workers of the reason, and how the situation was relieved by the full use of bulletin-boards and the setting up of a Works Council.
